title: Petrobras receives $117 mln in financing to acquire UK goods and services
text:
57 AM / a few seconds ago Petrobras receives $117 million in financing to acquire UK goods and services Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Brazilian state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA has received a financing line of 400 million reais ($117 million) from Credit Agricole Corporate Investment Bank to be used to acquire goods and services from UK suppliers, the company said. The logo of Brazil's state-run oil company Petrobras is pictured in the company headquarters in Sao Paulo, Brazil February 20, 2018. REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker/File Photo 
In a statement on Friday, Petrobras, as the company is known, said the financing line expires in 2029 and comes with a guarantee from UK Export Finance, the United Kingdomâ€™s export credit agency. Reporting by Gram Slattery
